text: aur usake paas gaib kee kunjiyo hain jinako usake siva koee nahee jaanata aur jo kuchh khushakee aur taree mein hai usako (bhee) vahee jaanata hai aur koee patta bhee nahin khatakata magar vah use zarur jaanata hai aur zameen kee taariqiyon mein koee daana aur na koee khushk cheez hai magar vah nooraanee kitaab (lauhe mahaphooz) mein maujood hai
